sentences.sContent: SITTBOW, Cambodia (Reuters) - Cambodians are flocking to see a three-year-old boy they believe was the son of a dragon in a former life because his best friend is a four-meter-long python.
sentences.sContent_eng: SITTBOW, Cambodia (Reuters) - Cambodians are flocking to see a three-year-old boy they believe was the son of a dragon in a former life because his best friend is a four-meter-long python.
sentences.sCn: 柬埔寨，路透社-柬埔寨人都成群结队去观看一个三岁的小男孩，由于小男孩最好的朋友是一条四米长的巨蟒，人们认为小孩前生是一条龙的儿子。

sentences.sContent: Fat does a heart good—at least if you're a python, a new study says.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fat does a heart good—at least if you're a python, a new study says.
sentences.sCn: 一项新研究得出的结论是，脂肪对心脏是有好处的——如果你是一条巨蟒的话。

trans.tranOther: a large tropical snake that kills animals for food by winding itself around them and crushing them
